login.title: Login to uuGPT

login.capchaPlaceholder: Capcha code sent to your email
login.forgotSuccess: Please check your email for instructions on how to reset your password.

app.title: uuGPT
app.imageSaveHint: This image will be available for 60 minutes. Right click + save as!
app.textareaPlaceholder: Enter your question for AI here
app.errorMessage: There was an error. Maybe the API key is wrong? Or the servers could be down?
app.apiKeyNotSet: API key is not set. Please set the API key before initializing.
app.apiNotInitialized: OpenAI API is not initialized. Please call initOpenAIApi with your API key first.
app.checkingApiConfiguration: Checking if OpenAI API is configured.
app.linkError: Server connection error, please try again.

aisystem: Please respond in English. Your response must be provided in Markdown format. At the end of your response, include three clickable reference links.

pricing.choosePlanDescription: Select the most suitable plan for your needs and enjoy powerful AI services.
pricing.freePlanFeature1: 40 daily accesses to basic models (GPT-4o mini, Claude 3 Haiku)
pricing.basicPlanDesc: Ideal for small projects and personal use
pricing.basicPlanFeature1: Up to 5000 monthly accesses to basic models (GPT-4o mini, Claude 3 Haiku)
pricing.basicPlanFeature2: Up to 200 monthly accesses to advanced models (o1-preview, Claude 3.5, Gemini 1.5 Pro)
pricing.proPlanDesc: Perfect for heavy usage, includes all features
pricing.proPlanFeature1: Unlimited access to basic models (GPT-4o mini, Claude 3 Haiku)
pricing.proPlanFeature2: Unlimited access to advanced models (o1-preview, Claude 3.5, Gemini 1.5 Pro)
pricing.priceComparisonDesc: Compared to subscribing GPT, Claude, and Gemini separately, our aggregate plan helps you save more!
pricing.priceComparisonConclusion: Pay once for multiple AI services, no need for separate subscriptions, saving you time and money!
pricing.faqQ1: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
pricing.faqA1: Yes, you can cancel or modify your plan at any time in your account settings, effective next billing cycle.
pricing.faqQ2: Do you provide invoices or receipts?
pricing.faqA2: We provide digital receipts upon each successful payment. Check your account center or contact support if needed.
